sql.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS news ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, list_id INTEGER, type INTEGER, date DATE, startteaser TEXT, status TEXT, title TEXT, teaser TEXT, image_url TEXT, image_copyright TEXT, image_string BLOB, details_xml TEXT, video_url TEXT, video_stream_url TEXT, last_changed DATE, changed_date_time DATETIME, details_date DATE, details_title TEXT, details_image_url TEXT, details_image_copyright TEXT, details_image_last_changed DATE, details_image_changed_date_time DATETIME, details_image_string BLOB, details_text TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS news_lists ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, type INTEGER, parent_news_id TEXT, title TEXT)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS plenums ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, status INTEGER, type INTEGER, date DATE, title TEXT, teaser TEXT, text TEXT, image_url TEXT, image_copyright TEXT, image_string BLOB)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS members ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, member_id TEXT, name TEXT, bio_url TEXT, info_url TEXT, info_url_more TEXT, land TEXT, photo TEXT, photo_string BLOB, photo_last_changed DATE, photo_changed_date_time DATETIME, last_changed DATE, changed_date_time DATETIME, details_status TEXT, details_exit_date DATE, details_last_name TEXT, details_first_name TEXT, details_title TEXT, details_course TEXT, details_local TEXT, details_birthdate DATE, details_religion TEXT, details_degree TEXT, details_higher_education TEXT, details_profession TEXT, details_profession_field TEXT, details_sex TEXT, details_marital_status TEXT, details_children INTEGER, details_fraction TEXT, details_party TEXT, details_city TEXT, details_elected TEXT, details_bio_url TEXT, details_information TEXT, details_more TEXT, details_homepage TEXT, details_phone TEXT, details_disclosure_information TEXT, details_media_photo TEXT, details_media_photo_string BLOB, details_media_photo_copyright TEXT, details_speaker_url TEXT, details_speaker_rss TEXT, details_election_number TEXT, details_election_name TEXT, details_election_url TEXT, details_election_city TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS member_groups ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, member_id INTEGER, type INTEGER, group_id TEXT, title TEXT, name TEXT, url TEXT, rss TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS member_websites ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, member_id TEXT, title TEXT, url TEXT)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS committees ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, committee_id TEXT, name TEXT, course TEXT, teaser TEXT, last_changed DATE, changed_date_time DATETIME, image_last_changed DATE, image_changed_date_time DATETIME, details_xml TEXT, details_name TEXT, details_photo_url TEXT, details_photo_string BLOB, details_photo_copyright TEXT, description TEXT)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS committees_news ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, committee_id TEXT, date DATE, title TEXT, teaser TEXT, image_url TEXT, image_string BLOB, image_copyright TEXT, details_xml TEXT, last_changed DATE, details_date TEXT, details_title TEXT, details_image_url TEXT, details_image_string TEXT, details_image_copyright TEXT, details_image_last_changed DATE, details_image_changed_date_time DATETIME, details_text TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS visitors ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, date DATE, type TEXT, id TEXT, url TEXT, image_string BLOB)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS visitors_article_lists ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, type INTEGER, parent_article_id TEXT, title TEXT)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS visitors_articles ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, date DATE, type TEXT, specific_type INTEGER, article_list_id INTEGER, id TEXT, title TEXT, teaser TEXT, text TEXT, image_id TEXT, image_string BLOB, image_copyright TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS visitors_galleries ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, title TEXT, gallery_id TEXT )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS visitors_pictures ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, image_id TEXT, image_date DATE, image_string BLOB, image_copyright TEXT, text TEXT, gallery_id TEXT, article_id TEXT, teaser TEXT, list_id TEXT)
